programme.desc: Zahwa (Jennifer Eve) is stressed and annoyed with her boss, Adit (Ridho Illahi), who asks her to sell multiple apartment units in a single day as a salesperson. However, that annoyance slowly turns into the seeds of love.

programme.title: MAKAN TEROOOS - EP 23
programme.desc: Explore culinary references that serve authentic flavors. Follow the culinary adventure of Indonesia only at Makan Terooos.

programme.title: THE SULTAN ENTERTAINMENT - EP 29
programme.desc: The Sultan is a talk show featuring two sultan-like hosts: Sultan Andara and Raffi Ahmad and Sultan Bintaro and Andre Taulany, accompanied by a cast of beautiful and handsome employees. It features spectacular guest stars and is definitely not to be missed. Find out more at The Sultan Entertainment.

programme.title: PESONA WAJAH INDONESIA - EP 28
programme.desc: A semi-documentary exploring many aspects, such as cultures, culinary, and many more of cities in Indonesia

programme.title: GASPOL - EP 85
programme.desc: Gaspol, an SCTV game show hosted by Raffi Ahmad, is filled with prizes and tens of millions of rupiah in cash.

programme.title: Sudah Jatuh Ketiban Duren Iya Lagi Iya Lagi
programme.desc: Juna, a durian tycoon who owns a durian orchard, meets Ambar, unaware that Juna is the boss of the durian orchard that Ambar is looking after. Juna, who is sick because it's his first time working in the field, doesn't get any attention from Maya. But suddenly Maya cheats on him with Aldo. Juna, who finds out, is disappointed with Maya.

programme.title: Cinta Abang Tamvan Pantang Disayurin
programme.desc: Nando (Morgan Oey) helps Sesil (Rayna Snova), who is about to be sold abroad. Nando asks his mother for permission to let Sesil stay at her house.

programme.title: BARAYA URANG PASUNDAN - EP 22
programme.desc: Semi-documentary that explores a region of West Java lived by Sundanese

programme.title: BALI TRADISI - EP 25
programme.desc: A semi documentary that show about the traditions that has been passed down in Bali.

programme.title: HOT SHOT - EP 508
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang membahas kehidupan selebriti secara mendalam.

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 18
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: Garam dan Madu Aku Biro Kamu Mau?
programme.desc: A beautiful girl named Fuji (Larasati Nugroho), the owner of a matchmaking agency. One day, Fuji gets a client, a barbershop owner's son named Ivan (Arya Vasco). From there, Ivan is asked by his mother to find a partner. Until finally, Ivan, the barbershop owner, says, "Why don't you be my partner, and I introduce you to my mother?"

programme.title: Mahkotamu Ketinggalan di DC Cakung Queen
programme.desc: Keyla was shocked to meet Roy at the market. Roy accidentally saw Keyla, Keyla immediately ran into the market and accidentally hit Yudi in the market. The fruit that Yudi brought was all messed up. Keyla rushed to avoid Roy. Keyla wanted to find her family who had been separated for a long time.

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 18
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: JANGAN ADA KUDA DIANTARA KITA
programme.desc: Finally Ayu (Angelica Simperler) can see the horse racing venue. While watching the horse race, Ayu is pickpocketed, fortunately there is Bima (Lucky Perdana) who immediately stops the pickpocket along with Jalu, his horse. But unfortunately luck is not on Bima's side, Jalu is stolen and he can't do anything, even Bima suffers a back injury. Bima decides to go to the village to calm down because he lost Jalu. Bima then meets Ayu again.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 30
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Sama Kamu Emang Kadang Kiding
programme.desc: While Airin was in a coma in the hospital, Bagas (Endy Arfian) became close to Airin's older sister, Zaskia (Dannia Salsabilla). As time went on, Bagas, who was initially thought to be marrying Airin, now developed feelings for Zaskia.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 484
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

Alin and Farel met again on campus after Farel was accused of peeping in the women's restroom. Farel held a grudge against Alin and often bullied her.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 3

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 3

programme.title: Tanya Sama Pokok - EP 9

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 7
programme.desc: The Czech capital transports visitors through the ages. Prague, a city steeped in magic, by the legendary presence of alchemists in the 16th century, but especially by the multiple cultures that have intertwined there. Classified as a UNESCO World Heritage site, the old town attracts millions of tourists every year.

programme.title: Roc D'azur 2025
programme.desc: Each October, since 1984, Frejus welcomes Roc d'Azur, the world's largest mountain bike event. A sports gathering that, over the years, has become the leading competition for all-terrain bikes with nearly 20,000 participants. A look back at the highlights of the 2025 event.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 7
programme.desc: Paule is falling increasingly in love with Julien, a situation firmly disapproved of by the law firm. Consumed by guilt, Irene is determined to watch over her, to the point of following her into the most extreme situations. Together they even go as far as exhuming a victim's body...

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 8
programme.desc: Paule and Irene take a major pharmaceutical company to court for having marketed a drug dangerous for young children. By working together they manage to win the confidence of a cardiologist, a whistle-blower sidelined by her superior because of her accusations.

programme.desc: Simon D'Amours meets Katarina Welsch, interpretation coordinator for the Kluane National Park. He then joins Eva Thevenin, student in periglacial geomorphology, before his adventure comes to an end collecting samples in the company of Sophie Pouille.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 11
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 14
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 27
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 44
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 1
programme.desc: Pokou is very moved when she finds an object that once belonged to her mother. Then she is told that a surprise awaits her at the palace: her Aunt Akuba is back!

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 2
programme.desc: Akuba has returned for a very special reason: she has to marry Kakou, the prince of a neighbouring kingdom. Pokou is suspicious of the plan and tries to put a stop to it.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 17
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Enquetes De Region - EP 7
programme.desc: Travels to discover the regions of France. Through these territories, the investigations come as close as possible to the issues of today's society.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: En Tongs Au Pied De L'himalaya
programme.desc: Andrea, aged 6, has an autism spectrum disorder. He is starting the final year of kindergarten, a crucial year that will determine whether he can stay in school. For Pauline, his mother, the stakes are high. Especially as, recently separated and with no fixed income, she is struggling to find her own stability.

programme.title: En Piste !
programme.desc: Pauline is the witness at her best friend's wedding and hopes to take advantage of this special day to get closer to the handsome Raphael. But she finds it hard to let her gaze stray from her handicapped daughter, Emma, who she didn't want to leave with a childminder.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 5
programme.desc: Eleonore and Manon visit a nail salon. Francesca has a malaise during an activity with Raymond and the latter makes her to go and see a doctor. Jean-Baptiste returns from his trip.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 6
programme.desc: Napoleon is worried about eleonore. Laurie-Lou accompanies her grandmother on an outing. Paul and Louis talk for the first time since Sacha's birth.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 7
programme.desc: Eleonore attends a meeting for bereaved parents in the hope of finding comfort. Louis and his sisters visit care homes to find somewhere for Margot.

programme.title: Ethique Helvetique - EP 12
programme.desc: The witch hunts, one of the greatest atrocities Europe has ever known. The bloodiest period spanned from the 15th to the 18th century. It all began in Valais, and Switzerland burned ten times more witches than France and a hundred times more than Italy.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 8
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Prisme
programme.desc: A film jointly created by three women film-makers of different coloured skins. Between Brussels and Paris, they reveal the problems that come from today's photographic media, technologically biased in favour of those with Caucasian skin. A starting point that facilitates an exploration of other inequalities, also based on skin colour.

programme.title: La Grande Arche
programme.desc: When the austere district of La Defense, a symbol of modernity, becomes the setting for a reflection on architecture, memory, and power.

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Celine are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Celine meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: Movie - Neeya 2

programme.title: Movie - America America

programme.title: Movie - Aagaya Thamaraigal
programme.desc: A bank official falls in love with a local resident whose brother doesn't approve of their relationship.

programme.title: Movie - Athiradi Vettai

programme.title: Movie - Romeo Juliet

programme.title: Movie - Indhira
programme.desc: Two villages are constantly at war, headed by their respective leaders. When one of the leaders is killed, his daughter succeeds him and puts up a brave fight to reunite the two villages.

programme.title: Movie - Kondaan Koduthaan
programme.desc: A large extended family has been carrying out an age-old tradition of marrying within the family. However, the familial bonds begin to disintegrate when the youngsters do not wish to comply.

programme.title: Movie - Thayamma
programme.desc: Pandiyan, Anand and Babu are friends who live in the same apartment. One day, they are shocked to find a child at their doorstep as it does not belong to any of them.

programme.title: Movie - Dharma Devathai

programme.title: Movie - Vanavil
programme.desc: Surya, Prakash and Priya are three IAS aspirants. Surya and Priya fall in love and Prakash, her secret admirer, silently becomes an enemy posing as a friend who plots to get rid of Surya.

programme.title: Movie - Sippikkul Muthu

Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 26
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier League's greatest ever players.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 17
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: Bournemouth vs Everton (MW14) - EP 131
programme.desc: Everton have never won in eight away league games against Bournemouth (D2 L6), losing the last four in a row. It’s the most they’ve faced a side on the road without ever winning in their league history.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW14) - EP 133
programme.desc: Newcastle have won five of their last six Premier League games against Tottenham (L1), as many as they had in their previous 17 (D2 L10).

programme.title: Liverpool vs Sunderland (MW14) (Live) - EP 139
programme.desc: Sunderland are winless in their last 18 away league games against Liverpool (D9 L9), with their last victory at Anfield coming in October 1983 (1-0).

programme.desc: Since losing their first ever Premier League meeting with Brentford in August 2021, Arsenal are now unbeaten in their last seven against the Bees (W5 D2).

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew 'One Gear' Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Nate Campbell vs. Ali Funeka
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features lightweights Nate Campbell, aka 'The Galaxy Warrior', (32-1, 25 KOs) vs. Ali 'Rush Hour' Funeka (30-1, 25 KOs) from the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA, on February 14, 2009 in a bout viewed on television by 1.2 million.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Deandre Latimore vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: This episode features Carlos Quintana's penultimate bout, as he fights Deandre Latimore, in a light middleweight title contest, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Boy's CMX Form and Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney World, Orlando, FL.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Carlos Baldomir vs. Vernon Forrest
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Carlos Baldomir and Vernon Forrest facing off to determine the new WBC super welterweight world champion, a fight that earns both fighters an ovation at the end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Asanoyama, Tochiozan, Hokutofuji and Ishiura from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. programme.title: FS MMA Fedor Emelianenko vs. Matt Linland
programme.desc: This week's edition features BODOGFIGHT: Clash of the Nations, taking place from the ICE Palace in St. Petersburg, Russia. programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 108
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch bunny rabbits. Bunny ears and tails appear on the Teletubbies. They do the 'bunny hop hop' before saying 'eh oh' to the Tiddlytubbies.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S6) - EP 8
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'frog', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: Hooper and Helping Hand are building an amazing theme park: Hooper Dooper Land! The attractions aren't ready yet but the friends are so excited that Hooper decides to open the park early.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 16
programme.desc: Mayor Oki creates a new perfume that everyone in OKIDO adores. But what are the bees so upset about?

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 40
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 39
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 13
programme.desc: The Squirrels haven't been making good choices round the messy clubhouse. With Duggee's help, they start to get it right. But not before sending Roly's imagination into overdrive!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 12
programme.desc: When they're accidentally shut in the shed, Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make the time pass with calm breathing and made-up games. The Squirrels cope so well. Does Duggee?

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch builds his effigy in ice, his digging threatens the Lambert Glacier in Antarctica.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 49
programme.desc: Mum reminisces about Bluey and Judo as babies. Bluey learnt to roll over first, but Judo was the first to crawl, so then it became a race to see who was going to walk first.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to New Zealand on a baby animal mission to help rescue a family of blue ducks and their chicks from a fast flowing river. Along the way, Andy takes a ride on a pukeko chick and meets a hedgehog.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: Jamie and his search-and-rescue dog Dan head for the hills to earn their Compass Badge searching for some missing ramblers and their teachers.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet a giant anteater and give him his breakfast in a long tube. Next, they meet some chimpanzees to find out the wild connection between these two animals.

programme.title: Playtime Towers (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bella and Lift visit the Fortress of Fun, where Kingsley and Queenie play a fun game of 'Wavey Wavey Snap' using some giant, silly gloves.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 9
programme.desc: Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the things trees do for creatures around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 29
programme.desc: Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 28
programme.desc: Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 8
programme.desc: While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas and Gabriela get ready for the Batucada carnival at the docks.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: When the zip on Sarah's hoodie breaks, Scarf Lady suggests a trip to the haberdasher.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 39
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: Stanley is called to pose as a model for the town's art club, but he's got lots of jobs on and won't stay still. Peggy and the gang must come up with a way to keep Stanley still.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 35
programme.desc: Stanley helps Seamus and Little Woo reconstruct the Big Wheel from Seamus' childhood. This is more difficult than Stanley thought it would be as it needs a clean and an upgrade.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Monty believes that parents can fix everything, until he is told by his parents that they cannot fix his toy helicopter.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran see Cynthia building a new greenhouse and decide to build a den. But when the den is too small both of them to fit in, Gran Gran helps JoJo to build a bigger den.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 35

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 50
programme.desc: Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen & Scout head to Alaska, in America, on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of fish being buried underground. Along the way, Andy meets a grizzly bear cub setting out on its first fishing trip with its mother to catch salmon.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Disability assistance dog Tinks visits Clip-Clop Stables with Charli, where they meet a very tall horse called Mist who is taking Charli for her first ever horse-riding lesson.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet a group of busy meerkats, who show them their digging skills, then go to see some giant millipedes to find out the surprising skill they have in common.

programme.title: Playtime Towers (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: It's laundry day in Playtime Towers, and Bella and Lift have washed everyone's socks. All they need to do now is find the matching pairs!

programme.desc: Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.desc: After being scolded for making a mistake, Diesel plays a trick on Rebecca to try and get the other engines in trouble.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 1
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe - EP 1
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2694
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: Court Lady - EP 10
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: This children's programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2695
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Under The Moonlight & What's On Today - EP 33
programme.desc: The drama is adapted from Shui He's novel "Under The Moonlight ". It tells the story of Luo Shu, who is trapped in the quagmire of fate but still tries to save herself, and meets Qi Menglin, who is full of vigour and only wants to roam the world. The two work together to solve cases.

programme.title: Take Liza to the World
programme.desc: Featuring Liza Wang, this travel variety show journeys to unique destinations alongside a cast of younger artists. Each guest leads Liza to places meaningful to them, introducing local scenery, culture, cuisine and little-known attractions.

programme.title: Tastebuds Pamper Top 100 Delicacy Restro
programme.desc: The show takes you to visit restaurants and shops that may not be mentioned in travel guides or are not particularly noticeable. In addition to discovering hidden gems, our food experts will also share their personal tips for enjoying the dishes.

programme.title: Open Book
programme.desc: Each episode of this show introduces a good book, spanning subjects such as science, history, literature, novels and even fashion, sharing interesting knowledge gained from these books.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 12
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline & What's On Today
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

Lau Yu-fan goes to the prison to see Lee Nga-man as he hopes she has some way to make Tai Wing-keung come back to testify against Tai Cho-fuk.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 1
programme.desc: Rewind to 2019, and while on duty, West Kowloon Regional PTU task force Sergeant Brother Shu, police officers Kwan Chi-hin, Tsui Kwok-yin and Tsan run into a jewelry heist. Hardened criminal Chan Cho-yiu snatches Tsan’s gun and shoots Brother Shu dead on the spot. To save his teammates, Chi-hin throws away his gun, kneels down and surrenders. The cold-blooded shot changes the four police officers’ destinies.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 769
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2096
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 7
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 24
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The judge declines Lau Yu-fan’s application for an extension of the trial. The police force, ICAC and Department of Justice call a meeting to discuss whether the trial of the Tai Cho-fuk case should be extended so as to prosecute all those involved in collusion between officials and businessmen.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 31
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2097
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 29
programme.desc: Chi-bun is very worried as Ho-yee declares she is going to find the murder weapon that was used for killing Sau-yi, so he returns to the Yau household to look for the murder weapon. However, police catch him. Chi-bun wants to bring Ka-pik and Hiu-ling along as he flees. But Rio and Ko Tsun intercept him with their car.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 769
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 13
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 2
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 18
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 27
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 4
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 1
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 8
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 9
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Kill Time
programme.desc: Mak stumbles upon an obscure website "Witch's Zone" when looking for a copy of her dead father's favorite song. The mysterious website only allows one purchase but Mak cannot resist buying one more purple scarf. Not only does the scarf triggers her memories of her father and her first love, it may also be a vital clue in a mysterious murder.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Royal Tramp II
programme.desc: The leader of Dragon clan, Long Er, helps General Wu to overthrow Emperor Kang Xi. However, Long Er is betrayed by General Wu and is rescued by Xiao Bao. As a result, she bestows her virginity and martial arts power to Xiao Bao to fight against Wu. At the same time, Xiao Bao fortuitously unveils the hidden treasures from "The Sutra of 42 Chapters".

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms" Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts World's intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fete. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back...

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers' death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiao's home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wife's faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Long's wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident...

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu's beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return...

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the "speed gang", led by Johnny, and Kuo's sister Carrie is molested by Johnny's brother Michael. Kuo's family continues to be harassed by the "speed gang" while on the island - can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: i Walker
programme.desc: Eight i Walkers take you around the world in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 24
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Divas Hit the Road 7 - EP 11
programme.desc: Join Na Ying and a lively team of seven as they dive into a 25 day Silk Road trip filled with cultural encounters, heartfelt moments, and self-discovery, bringing Chinese culture to life on a global stage.

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 25
programme.desc: The story revolves around seven lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: Ride the Wind 2023 - EP 14
programme.desc: Experience the strength of international female solidarity as talented performers from diverse industries unite to showcase the beauty of Chinese culture and surpass their own limits in the highly anticipated season of Sisters.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 25
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Perfect Match 11 - EP 45
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 337
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Divas Hit the Road 7 - EP 11
programme.desc: Join Na Ying and a lively team of seven as they dive into a 25 day Silk Road trip filled with cultural encounters, heartfelt moments, and self-discovery, bringing Chinese culture to life on a global stage.

programme.title: Oh! My Queen - EP 91
programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! Delving into topics that resonate with everyone, each episode unfolds with lively discussions, injecting humor and joy into our daily lives, your go-to remedy for stress and a guaranteed laughter-inducing escape!

programme.title: Final Destiny - EP 6
programme.desc: Jigong (Xiao Zhengnan) was originally a saint, however he falls into the mortal world for the investigation of some cases. Later, he loses all memories, becomes a mortal and leads a life with other villagers.

programme.title: Perfect Match 11 - EP 45
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 195
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Final Destiny - EP 7
programme.desc: Jigong (Xiao Zhengnan) was originally a saint, however he falls into the mortal world for the investigation of some cases. Later, he loses all memories, becomes a mortal and leads a life with other villagers.

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 338
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: World's No. 1: Philippines - EP 3
programme.desc: Dive into The World's No.1: Philippines, an exhilarating journey through a nation bursting with color, flavor, and life! From bustling street markets and fiery kitchens to hidden natural wonders and heartwarming local stories, every stop unveils the true spirit and irresistible charm of the Philippines.

programme.title: Mr Player - EP 70
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 26
programme.desc: The story revolves around seven lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: World's No. 1: Philippines - EP 3
programme.desc: Dive into The World's No.1: Philippines, an exhilarating journey through a nation bursting with color, flavor, and life! From bustling street markets and fiery kitchens to hidden natural wonders and heartwarming local stories, every stop unveils the true spirit and irresistible charm of the Philippines.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 25
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 5 - EP 13
programme.desc: A brand-new, high-stakes format "Alliance Battles with Group Elimination" kicks off this season. Seven teams are divided into two alliances, sharing votes within each. The alliance with the lowest total votes will see an entire team eliminated. A gripping battle of passion, teamwork, and perseverance unfolds among the brothers. Who will rise, and who will fall?

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 26
programme.desc: The story revolves around seven lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 195
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 26
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.
